dissect.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to cut up the body of a dead animal or person in order to study it
dissect.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to examine something carefully in order to understand it
dissect.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: books in which the lives of famous people are dissected
dissect.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to divide an area of land into several smaller pieces
